     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox16936735">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16936735">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16936735">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content16936735">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            Contact:
           </em>
           <br />
           <br />
           <a href="mailto:kcannon@muhlenberg.edu">
            Kelly Cannon
           </a>
           <br />
           Outreach and Scholarly
           <br />
           Communication Librarian,
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business
           <br />
           Subject Specialist
           <br />
           <br />
           phone: 484-664-3602
           <br />
           email:
           <a href="mailto:kcannon@muhlenberg.edu">
            kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           </a>
           <br />
           <br />
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16936735" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox16936822">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16936822">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16936822">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Biographies in Reference Works
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16936822">
          <div id="boxatt16936822" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link19978713">
              <a id="link_19978713" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19978713,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Modern European History', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508858}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Hundreds of authoritative dictionaries, encyclopedias, fact books, guides, companions and more from respected publishers across dozens of major subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22516376">
              <a id="link_22516376" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://infotrac.galegroup.com/itweb/mul_coll?db=DLBC" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22516376,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Modern European History', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 22516376}); ">
               Dictionary of Literary Biography Complete Online
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides authoritative biographical and critical essays on the lives, works, and careers of the world's most influential literary figures from all eras and genres.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19978686">
              <a id="link_19978686" href="http://www.iep.utm.edu/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19978686,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Modern European History', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12730249}); ">
               Internet Encyclopedia of Philosophy
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Peer-reviewed open-access encyclopedia.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19978676">
              <a id="link_19978676" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://infotrac.galegroup.com/itweb/mul_coll?db=LCO" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19978676,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Modern European History', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19978676}); ">
               Literature Criticism Online
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. Literary biography and criticism.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19978689">
              <a id="link_19978689" href="http://plato.stanford.edu/about.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19978689,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Modern European History', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12730296}); ">
               Stanford Encyclopedia of Philosophy
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Peer-reviewed open-access encyclopedia.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25151074">
              <a id="link_25151074" href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25151074,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Modern European History', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20019552}); ">
               Wikipedia
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A communally-written encyclopedia. Anyone can edit or contribute an entry, at any time. Excellent for locating controversies on a topic and getting ideas for research papers. The bibliographies often point to scholarly resources. Not itself a scholarly source per se, with no authority control. Compare with Scholarpedia.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16936843">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16936843">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16936843">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Book-Length Biographies
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16936843">
          <div id="boxatt16936843" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link19978700">
              <a id="link_19978700" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19978700,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Modern European History', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16936853">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16936853">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16936853">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Journal Articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16936853">
          <div id="boxatt16936853" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link19978706">
              <a id="link_19978706" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=30h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19978706,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Modern European History', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329218}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides indexing, abstracts, and selected full text of articles appearing in history journals, with emphasis on world history from 1450 to present (excluding the U.S. and Canada which are covered in America: History and Life). It includes citations to books, journal articles, and dissertations.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16936870">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16936870">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16936870">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Websites
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16936870">
          <div id="boxatt16936870" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link19978738">
              <a id="link_19978738" href="http://www.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19978738,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Modern European History', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19978738}); ">
               Google
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Authoritativeness will vary. Assess author and institutional affiliation.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>

      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox16936737">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16936737">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16936737">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16936737">
          <div id="boxatt16936737" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link19978541">
              <a id="link_19978541" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19978541,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Modern European History', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19978541}); ">
               Trexler Library Citation Guides
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Brief, easy-to-use guides to the 3 most used citation styles: APA, Chicago (Turabian), MLA.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19978542">
              <a id="link_19978542" href="http://www.zotero.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19978542,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Modern European History', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19978542}); ">
               Zotero
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Free citation tool. Does the citing for you! Loved by librarians, professors, and students alike.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>

     <div class="popup_head">
      <table align="right" border="0">
       <tr>
        <td valign="bottom" height="18">
         <a href="#" onclick="return hideAlert('popupinfo')">
          <img alt="Close" src="http://lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/window_close_grey.gif" border="0" align="absbottom" />
         </a>
        </td>
       </tr>
      </table>
      <div id="popupinfotitle" style="display:inline;">
       <h6>
        More Information
       </h6>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="popup_body">
      <div id="popupinfocontent" style="display:inline;">
       <img alt="Loading" src="http://lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/indicator.gif" />
       &nbsp; Loading...
      </div>
      <br />
      <center>
       <a href="#" onclick="hideAlert('popupinfo'); return false;">
        Close
       </a>
      </center>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
  </div>
  <div id="dp" style="width:850px;">
   &nbsp;
  </div>

   cssdropdown.startchrome("tabs12");
  </script>

                        st_type : content_config.hitsource,
